Agreement on Cooperation Signed between Courts of DPRK and Russia
articles.content:
Agreement on Cooperation Signed between Courts of DPRK and Russia  
   Moscow, May 23 (KCNA) -- An agreement on cooperation between the Central Court of the DPRK and the Supreme Court of the Russian Federation was signed in Moscow on May 23.
 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of the delegation of the Central Court of the DPRK led by President Kim Pyong Ryul on a visit to Russia and Pak Ui Chun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and from the Russian side were Byacheslav Rebezev, president of the Supreme Court of Russia, and officials concerned.    
 The agreement was inked by Kim Pyong Ryul and Byacheslav Rebezev.

Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il  
   Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of the Chinese People's Daily.
 The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Thursday by President of People's Daily Wang Chen who is leading the delegation.

Greetings to Italian Prime Minister and Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Italian Prime Minister and Foreign Minister  
   Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Romano Prodi upon his appointment as prime minister of Italy.
 The message wished him success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.    
 Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a similar message to Massimo D'Alema upon his appointment as deputy prime minister and foreign minister of Italy. The message expressed the belief that the relations between the DPRK and Italy would favorably develop in the interests of the two peoples in the future, too.
